contentBody.body:
The most sustainable platform

Many AI innovators are looking for ways to decrease power consumption to allow for more GPU power to be stacked in the data center. Pure Storage has a proven track record of efficiency and sustainability:
  • Unmatched efficiency, using only 10% of the power of legacy HDD systems
  • Reduces floor and rack space needs by up to 95%, slashing cooling costs by up to 75%
  • Cutting-edge design and recycling practices reduce e-waste by 3x, advancing a sustainable future
